ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit.completion

Class APIDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit.completion.APIDatabase

  • public class APIDatabase
extends Object
    A shared database of cached Java class and package information.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String STRANGE_EONS_API_BASE
      A URL describing the base location where the Strange Eons API documentation is located, if the API documentation core plug-in is installed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PackageRoot getPackageRoot()
      Returns a package root for the Strange Eons API (including the Java API).
      static String[] listJavaDocClasses(String baseURL)
      Given the URL of the base directory of a JavaDoc collection, extracts a list of all of the documented classes with their full package names.

    • Field Detail

      • STRANGE_EONS_API_BASE

        public static final String STRANGE_EONS_API_BASE
        A URL describing the base location where the Strange Eons API documentation is located, if the API documentation core plug-in is installed.
        See Also:
        listJavaDocClasses(java.lang.String), Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getPackageRoot

        public static PackageRoot getPackageRoot()
        Returns a package root for the Strange Eons API (including the Java API). This is a tree of APINodes representing the classes available for plug-ins to use.

        The returned package root should be treated as read-only, as it may be shared by many callers. Note that the root may be empty or incomplete if the API core plug-in is not installed.

        Returns:
        a package root of available classes

      • listJavaDocClasses

        public static String[] listJavaDocClasses(String baseURL)
                                   throws IOException
        Given the URL of the base directory of a JavaDoc collection, extracts a list of all of the documented classes with their full package names.
        Parameters:
        baseURL - a string containing the URL of a directory where a JavaDoc collection is stored
        Returns:
        an array of the names of the documented classes
        Throws:
        IOException
